about_the_game:
VIP Membership – Take your experience to the next level
With the VIP Membership, unlock exclusive content, daily rewards, and upgrades that will make you stand out in every battle and multiplayer event.

Main Features:

Exclusive Items:

  • Access 33 unique lines and 3 exclusive rabiola types.

  • Unlock all kites available in the game.

  • Line rental system with limited usage opportunities (non-tradable).

  • 11 exclusive skins to customize your player.

  • Increased chances of winning when opening surprise boxes.

Daily Bonuses and Accelerated Progression:

  • x2 experience to level up faster.

  • x2 gold earnings in battles.

  • Daily rewards with x2 gold and diamonds.

Exclusive Map Access:

  • Entry to the VIP zone located at the back of the map.

  • Use the Luck Machine to play with gold and earn additional rewards.

Enhanced Multiplayer:

  • Participation in the Global Ranking.

  • RCON configuration to manage multiplayer rooms.

  • VIP nickname with a special icon and yellow-colored chat text.

  • Increase the line marketplace sales limit to 2,500 diamonds per line (compared to the standard 400-diamond limit).

Make every match a unique experience and show your true level with the VIP Membership!

name: CS Diamantes Pipas: DLC VIP Member

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy CS Diamantes Pipas: DLC VIP Member

short_description: Gain exclusive advantages with premium content, bonus rewards, faster progression, access to special areas, and advanced multiplayer customization.
supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
